name: yA_HUD
body:
---------------

More **Screenshots** (including customization options) [can be found here](http://imgur.com/a/xylsT).

---------------

Please read the **Readme** files, they contain a lot of answers to various questions.
(Customizing options, fixes for screen resolutions etc.)

---------------

To **download** the HUD press the **ZIP** button on the left.

---------------

To **install** go to Steam / steamapps / common / team fortress 2 / tf / custom / 
create a folder and name it, for example, hud / place resource and scripts in it. 

------------

![Box Version](http://i.imgur.com/fRqQS9G.jpg)
**Box Version**

---------------

![Blank Version](http://i.imgur.com/d0dA8G2.jpg)
**Blank Version**

---------------

![Lower Version](http://i.imgur.com/9AMUimp.jpg)
**Lower Version**

---------------

![Spectator HUD](http://i.imgur.com/w0E9Yno.jpg)
**Spectator HUD**

---------------

![Menu](http://i.imgur.com/LX4prQf.jpg)
**Main Menu**

---------------


Instruction on how to **customize** this HUD can be found in the **CUSTOMIZATION.txt**.
Instructions on how to fix the Menu and Scoreboard for 4:3 / 16:10 are in **README.text**.

---------------

If you have requests or bug reports please go to the [GitHub Page](https://github.com/whayay/yA_HUD) and then click on **Issues**.

----------------

Big thanks to **Garm3n** for making the original version and helping me fix mine!
Fullscreen charge meter is based on gmanghud, bg based on delihud

------------------

You can find Garmen's HUD [here](http://www.sdx-gaming.eu/?page_id=4097)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
